name: BMX Offroad Stickman Racing
description:
Unleash your Biker side as you play a role of a Stickman in this creative BMX Stickman Racing Game.BMX Stickman Racing is full of amazing 3D Cartoon doodle graphics which requires you to pay close attention to little details. Ride the BMX through sand dunes, mountains and rocky roads. Perform fancy tricks ,stunts and experience hours of fun with these fancy Stickman Characters. It is easy to rollover on these steep hills when you are descending.Avoid Crashing you may lose many seconds in recovering.
Right then, it’s time to leave all the other opponents staring at your dust!
